lines.text: Now look! I don't take kindly to kids playin' hooky from school. I think every kid in America ought to go to school... at least up to the eighth grade.
We don't go to school today, Bronco Billy. It's Saturday!
Have you ever been married?
Sure. A long time ago.
Did you love her?
With all my heart. Sometimes that just isn't enough.
What happened?
I caught her in bed with my best friend.
What did you do to him?
I shot her.
What! What about him?
He was my best friend!
Billy, my considered diagnosis is that you have the worst ailment known to man - no money!
Are you for real?
I'm who I want to be.
You should never kill a man unless it's absolutely necessary.
Good morning!
What's so good about it?
Smell that fresh morning air! Look at the blue sky above!
Have you been drinkin' some of Doc's Snakebite?
But why do I hate him so?
The Apaches have a word for that... it's called love.
Go ahead, let the tears fall in the beer.
I'm not crying!
There's nothing wrong with cryin'.
The smoke in here is hurting my eyes!
Do you understand what Bronco Billy and the wild west show are all about? You can be anything you want. All you have to do is go out and become it!

I've got a special message for you little pardners out there. I want you to finish your oatmeal at breakfast and do as your mom and pa tell you because they know best. Don't ever tell a lie and say your prayers at night before you go to bed. And as our friends south of the border say, 'Adios, amigos.'
What are you going to do?
I do the thinking around here.
I hadn't noticed.
Darling, may I put my hand on your breast.
NO.
He's like all men... a big kid in a man's body.
Killin's too good for you!

[Sarcastically while driving in rural country]
When do we get to the next VILLAGE?
